description: This Java class defines a data transfer object (DTO) named ConvertRequest used for handling conversion requests in a wiki-to-graph conversion backend. It contains fields for URL and raw content, with appropriate constructors, getters, and setters, and uses Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: ConvertRequest
classes.description: A DTO representing a conversion request, including URL or raw wiki content for processing.

methods.name: ConvertRequest
methods.description: Default constructor for the ConvertRequest class.

methods.name: ConvertRequest
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing the ConvertRequest with URL and content.

methods.name: getUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL to fetch wiki content from.

methods.name: setUrl
methods.description: Sets the URL to fetch wiki content from.
